name: Chain Lightning (milkchoco)
description:
You obtained the GRAPPLING-HOOK OF THUNDER !

Unfortunately, there isn't anything to hook onto in this dungeon, except for orcs.

They'll have to do.

Made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2021

Assets by 0x72, FirstBlood, datagoblin and Abstraction(Patreon Goal Reward Loops - Track 12)

Used Godot and SFBGames's ChipTone
